subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Justin Wilson won the pole for the final Champ Car race, Sunday’s Toyota Grand Prix of Long Beach, Calif. Champ Car has been largely absorbed into the Indy Racing League, but because the I.R.L. could not get out of a commitment to run Saturday in Motegi, Japan, it was decided the Champ Car event would go on.
